name: Castle Escape (itch) (Bearscythe Studios)
description:
After defeating the Evil Count our Hero escapes the castle through a hidden tunnel as it begins to crumble. Make it out alive or become one with the rubble!

A running platformer game made for the 2D Spooky Game Jam.

Controls:

Left/Right Arrow Keys - Move
Up/Space - Jump
Down Key - Duck and slide
Enter - Pause Game

All assets made by myself from scratch during the duration of the jam. Enjoy ^-^!
